ingredients: 1 pack of beyond meat beef crumbles
1/4 of a green bell pepper(finely chopped)
instructions: Saute the first five ingredients until translucent.
Add in the beef crumbles(I chop mine small) and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add the rest of the ingredients, cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes on low.
Serve over rice and with fried potatoes on top (if desired.)
